mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM T_FEATURE F WHERE del_yn = 'N' and F.ENR_DEPT_CODE = (SELECT dept_code FROM T_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})
SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM T_USER_FEATURE UF INNER JOIN T_USER U ON UF.user_id = U.user_id WHERE U.dept_code = (SELECT dept_code FROM T_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId});

SELECT ROUND(AVG(daily_login_count)) AS average_login_count FROM ( SELECT DATE(log_dt) AS log_date, COUNT(*) AS daily_login_count FROM cdp.t_log_user WHERE rqst_uri ILIKE '%login%' AND log_dt >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 year' GROUP BY log_date ) AS daily_counts;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM T_FEATURE F LEFT JOIN T_USER U ON F.ENR_USER_ID = U.USER_ID LEFT JOIN T_DEPT D ON F.ENR_DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE LEFT JOIN T_FEATURE_SE SE ON F.FEATURE_SE = SE.SE_ID LEFT JOIN T_CODE C ON F.FEATURE_TYP = C.CODE_ID WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM T_META_TB_SPEC WHERE DEL_YN='N'
SELECT log_dt FROM T_LOG_MGR WHERE rqst_body::text iLIKE '%"googleIdToken"%' AND (rspt_body::text ~* ('.*' || #{userId} || '.*')) ORDER BY log_dt DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT client_ip FROM T_LOG_MGR WHERE rqst_body::text iLIKE '%"googleIdToken"%' AND (rspt_body::text ~* ('.*' || #{userId} || '.*')) ORDER BY log_dt DESC LIMIT 1;

WITH LoginLogs AS ( SELECT l.rqst_uri, jsonb_extract_path_text(l.rqst_body, 'googleIdToken') AS google_id_token, jsonb_extract_path_text(l.rspt_body, 'body', 'data', 'deptNm') AS dept_nm, l.log_dt FROM t_log_user AS l WHERE l.rqst_uri ILIKE '%login%' AND jsonb_extract_path_text(l.rqst_body, 'googleIdToken') IS NOT NULL AND l.log_dt >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 week' ) SELECT dept_nm, COUNT(*) AS login_count FROM LoginLogs GROUP BY dept_nm ORDER BY login_count DESC LIMIT 4;
